channel.title: The Saltmere Chronicles
channel.description: A marine biologist returns to the town where her grandmother vanished fifty years ago. What she finds in the water is poison. What she finds in the town is silence. A 12-chapter literary mystery about generational secrets, environmental crime, and the weight of complicity.
